channel.title: [508]Changing ip on a custom client?[508]
channel.description:
ok, so i wanted to use a client that had dragon claws, dragon platebody, etc.. and i was wondering if anybody knew how to change the IP adress that the client connects to..right now it connects to me, [localhost]..how do i chang eit to like my ip adress lol?
INFO Client = ScapeRune Client 513 Soruce = *
plzz post :D! thanks!
-assassin.
EDIT: i tried looking in client.java, and couldn't find anything..so if it's in client.java post where it maybe :)!! thanks! all help is needed!

item.title: [508]Changing ip on a custom client?[508]
item.dc:creator: @AS75150 AS75150
item.description:
@AS75150 wrote:

GO TO YOUR GUI.JAVA OR EGUI.JAVA AND SEARCH FOR NO-IP OR 0.0.0.0 OR 127.0.0.1

HOPE THIS HELPS

ADD ME OK

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Changing ip on a custom client?[508]
item.dc:creator: @poolminer poolminer
item.description:
@poolminer wrote:

What you can try: (if 1 doesn’t work go to 2 etc.)

  1. search in you client.java for “Class68_Sub9.aString2883” or “127.0.0.1”
  2. open your Class68_Sub9.java and look for “127.0.0.1”
  3. search for “aString” until you found the ip (in client.java and Class68_Sub9.java)

You can also change the ip from “127.0.0.1” to JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,“Please enter your server ip:”);
Ip changer clients use that too.

Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = “127.0.0.1”;
Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,“Please enter your server ip:”);

Read full topic
